暮年.definition: one's declining years; one's old age

暮景.definition: an evening scene; fig. one's old age

暮歲.definition: the last days of the year; old age

暮氣.definition: evening mist; fig. declining spirits; lethargy

暮鼓晨鐘.definition: lit. evening drum, morning bell (idiom); fig. Buddhist monastic practice; the passage of time in a disciplined existence
